      • getDefaultModules

        public java.util.Set<ShutdownModule> getDefaultModules(DependencyResolverFactory dependencyResolverFactory,
                                              org.osgi.framework.BundleContext bundleContext)
        Description copied from interface: ModuleFactory
        Called when ModuleFactory is registered to config manager. Useful for populating the registry with pre-existing state. Since the method is called for each ModuleFactory separately and transaction is committed automatically, returned modules MUST be valid and commitable without any manual intervention.
        Specified by:
        getDefaultModules in interface ModuleFactory
        Overrides:
        getDefaultModules in class AbstractShutdownModuleFactory
        Parameters:
        dependencyResolverFactory - factory for getting dependency resolvers for each module.
        bundleContext - Reference to OSGi bundleContext that can be used to acquire OSGi services, startup configuration and other OSGi related information.
        Returns:
        set of default modules. Null is not allowed.
